DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Vaccine Adults With HIV
DOC.criteria: 18 year age diagnose HIV stable HAART minimum six month CD4 Tcell count great equal 350/mm3 screening No report CD4 Tcell count le 350/mm3 time screen Viral load le 50 copies/mL screen viral load great 400 copies/mL minimum six month prior screen Any chronic symptomatic infection HIV Use prior HIV vaccine ( prophylactic and/or therapeutic ) within one year screen Any malignancy may require systemic therapy Use investigational treatment within six month screen plan study enrollment , except investigational retrovirals obtain ACTG
